title: Finnish Verb Types Quiz - Verbityypit
description: Practice conjugating Finnish verbs in spoken Finnish (puhekieli)

questions.question: How do you say 'I speak' in spoken Finnish? (puhua)
questions.explanation: puhua ‚Üí m√§ puhun (min√§ puhun in written Finnish)

questions.question: How do you say 'you speak' in spoken Finnish? (puhua)
questions.explanation: puhua ‚Üí s√§ puhut (sin√§ puhut in written Finnish)

questions.question: How do you say 'he/she speaks' in spoken Finnish? (puhua)
questions.explanation: puhua ‚Üí se puhuu (h√§n puhuu in written Finnish)

questions.question: How do you say 'we speak' in spoken Finnish? (puhua)
questions.explanation: puhua ‚Üí me puhutaan (me puhumme in written Finnish)

questions.question: How do you say 'they speak' in spoken Finnish? (puhua)
questions.explanation: puhua ‚Üí ne puhuu (he puhuvat in written Finnish)

questions.explanation: asua ‚Üí se asuu (h√§n asuu in written Finnish)

questions.explanation: asua ‚Üí me asutaan (me asumme in written Finnish)

questions.question: How do you say 'I eat' in spoken Finnish? (sy√∂d√§)
questions.explanation: sy√∂d√§ ‚Üí m√§ sy√∂n (min√§ sy√∂n in written Finnish). No ending for h√§n/se!

questions.question: How do you say 'you eat' in spoken Finnish? (sy√∂d√§)
questions.explanation: sy√∂d√§ ‚Üí s√§ sy√∂t (sin√§ sy√∂t in written Finnish)

questions.explanation: sy√∂d√§ ‚Üí se sy√∂ (h√§n sy√∂ in written Finnish). Type 2: No ending for h√§n/se!

questions.question: How do you say 'we eat' in spoken Finnish? (sy√∂d√§)
questions.explanation: sy√∂d√§ ‚Üí me sy√∂d√§√§n (me sy√∂mme in written Finnish)

questions.question: How do you say 'they eat' in spoken Finnish? (sy√∂d√§)
questions.explanation: sy√∂d√§ ‚Üí ne sy√∂ (he sy√∂v√§t in written Finnish)
